title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction: polymeric materials, Engineering plastics, Polymer alloys, Selection of plastics, Mechanical properties, Degradation, Wear resistance, Frictional properties, Special properties, Structural features, Expanded plastics, Plastics as packaging material. Theoretical aspects; Visco-elastic behaviour, Mathematical models for visco-elastic behaviour, Deformation behaviour of plastics, Reinforced plastics. Analysis of polymer melt flow; Newtonian and non Newtonian fluid flow, Flow in circular section, Flow in rectangular section etc. Overview and analysis of various plastics forming operations; Extrusion, Injection moulding, Thermo-forming, Calendaring, Compression moulding, Blow moulding, Transfer moulding, Processing of reinforced plastics, Die design for simple components.
